body_html:
You do have the most context here though; per style guide:

https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#TODO_Comments

(...) or other identifier of the person or issue with the best context about the problem referenced by the TODO.

and

(..) A TODO is not a commitment that the person referenced will fix the problem.

body:
You do have the most context here though; per style guide:

https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#TODO_Comments
> (...) or other identifier of the person or issue with the best context about the problem referenced by the TODO.

and 

> (..) A TODO is not a commitment that the person referenced will fix the problem.
